about.description:
XlsxWriter is a Python module that can be used to write text, numbers, formulas
and hyperlinks to multiple worksheets in an Excel 2007+ XLSX file.
about.summary: A Python module for creating Excel XLSX files

about.description:
XlsxWriter is a Python module that can be used to write text, numbers, formulas
and hyperlinks to multiple worksheets in an Excel 2007+ XLSX file.
about.summary: A Python module for creating Excel XLSX files

name: xlsxwriter
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "XlsxWriter" %}
{% set version = "3.1.9" %}
{% set sha256 = "de810bf328c6a4550f4ffd6b0b34972aeb7ffcf40f3d285a0413734f9b63a929" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6

test:
  imports:
    - xlsxwriter

about:
  home: https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.io/
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: A Python module for creating Excel XLSX files
  description: |
    XlsxWriter is a Python module that can be used to write text, numbers, formulas
    and hyperlinks to multiple worksheets in an Excel 2007+ XLSX file.
  dev_url: https://github.com/jmcnamara/XlsxWriter
  doc_url: https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.org/
  doc_source_url: https://github.com/jmcnamara/XlsxWriter/blob/master/docs/XlsxWriter.pdf

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nehaljwani
